member.name: M:HR.CustomFunctions.getStringReader(System.Object)
member.summary: this function checks if the value is null and pass the string "" if it is it simply makes the code much readable by calling txt.Text = getStringReader(reader("field"))

member.name: M:HR.CustomFunctions.getHash(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this function generates hash values from passed arguments and returns it usually used for password encryption password cannot be retrieved, resetting new password is the workaround (more security)
member.param: String to be converted to hash.

member.name: P:HR.SysNumericUpDown.ReadOnly
